item.title: D Claws are single handed, how do i change them to a 2hand?
item.dc:creator: @3lou_55 3lou 55
item.description:
@3lou_55 wrote:

Ok Which Source Are U Using IF

Delta:
Open Client.java And Search For:

int[] two_hand = {

then u will see something like

int[] two_hand = {841, 6609, 1319, 4718, 4726, 1409, 4710, 7158, dclawidhere,
and just add the id as how they are made…

Or If Other Source
Open client.java And Search For:
public boolean item2handed(int ID)
and then u will see
if (ID == 7158 || ID == 1307 || ID == 1309 || ID == 1311 || ID == 1315 || ID == 1317 || ID == 1319 || ID == 6609)
just add onther || ID == youridhere || for 2handed

Warning:You Must Compile And Then Restart Server To Take Effect
Ask Me For Any Help On
-==-=-=–==-=-=

Delta Coding

508 Java Convension Coding
